div.div: at Cedar Rapids, Iowa | Clark Field

tr.td: Coe wins toss and defers. UW-SP will receive and defend South goal.
Jason Kimminau kickoff 46 yards to the UWSPFB19, C. Almonte return 23 yards to the UWSPFB42, out-of-bounds (Dylan Stepleton).
Jake Menzel rush for 5 yards to the UWSPFB47 (Brad Siebel;Mark Atwater).
Jake Menzel rush up middle for 4 yards to the COE49 (M. Berendes;Mark Atwater).
Jake Menzel rush up middle for 1 yard to the COE48, 1ST DOWN UWSPFB (G. Tarantino).
Kyle Larson pass incomplete to Jared Pankow, QB hurry by Blake Jack.
Kyle Larson pass incomplete to Matt Sosinsky.
Kyle Larson sacked for loss of 4 yards to the UWSPFB48 (Jake Morris).
